name: BumpBreaker!
description:
BumpBreaker!

Move paddle with AD keys or mouse cursor.  Fire Bumper with W key or double-click.

Assignment: create a game in the vein of the original Pong using a paddle with hitboxes that rebound the ball at differing angles.  Game features power-ups, multi-ball and a special Bumper that increases the ball's velocity and adds area-of-effect damage to its collision.

GAM 606, MFA in Game Development at the Academy of Art University.   Effects via Archanor FX on the Unity Asset Store.
